column6: Spider-Man's 99 Problems give way to one big one – Kraven, the Hunter! With countless lives on the line, can Peter Parker outfox his myusterious captors to win his freedom? Matt Kindt (Mind MGMT) and Marco Rudy (Swamp Thing) continue this year's most trippy trip through madness!
column8: | writer:MATT KINDT | penciller (cover):Marco Rudy Teixeira Retagi
